duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business-to-business sales efforts.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, managing multiple touch points simultaneously.
Engage in face-to-face interactions, networking, and portfolio building to address business owners' needs.
Maintain client relationships to drive future revenue growth and renewals.
Utilize compelling and persistent communication to bring concepts to life and sit at the top of the sales leaderboard.
